ComicInfo.Summary:
The Fundalini Pages: Various short satires of pop culture.
Spider-Sham 3: Spider-Sham battles Blandman and Venema with the Green Gobblygook's help.
The Young Man's Guide to Successful Mall Romance: Things not to do if you're trying to impress a date at the mall.
Planet TAD!!!!!: Story of Tad's experiences mowing lawns as a summer job.
Outtakes from Hillary's Sopranos Spoof: Stills from a Hillary Clinton tv commercial with humorous captions.
Failed Pitches for The New Simpsons Movie: Ideas for the Simpsons movie from various Hollywood personalities pitching their unique styles.
Things Shouted Out To Paris Hilton As She Left Prison: Unlikely questions for Paris regarding prison life.
Monroe and...the Summer Jobs Part 1: In the first strip, the White Spy fools the Black Spy with a fake half-buried look-alike of himself at the beach. In the second strip, the Black Spy retaliates for a nail on his chair, using a porcupine.
The MAD Guide for Public Speakers, Volume One: Phrases To Absolutely Avoid When Delivering a Eulogy...: Monroe gets a summer job delivering newspapers until he shows he can calm down animals.
A MAD Look At Mixed Martial Arts: Lines that would be offensive and in bad taste at funerals.
Celebrity Yu-Gi-Oh! Cards: Things that can go wrong in mixed martial arts contests.
The Believability / Unbelievability of Harry Potter: Celebrities as Yu-Gi-Oh! character cards, with their power levels and stats.
Boo!: Things that are unbelievable about the Harry Potter stories.
Drawn-Out Dramas: Major scenes from the movie skewered with goofy dialogue.
